verses.verse: Better <S%H2896><s%> is the <S%H7326>poor<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> than he that is <S%H4480>perverse<s%> <S%H6141><s%> in his <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and is a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

Also, <S%H1571><s%> that the <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> it is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and he that <S%H213>hasteth<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth.<s%>
The <S%H200>foolishness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5557>perverteth<s%> his <S%H1870>way:<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2196>fretteth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> <S%H3254>maketh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>friends;<s%> but the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is <S%H6504>separated<s%> from his <S%H4480>neighbor.<s%> <S%H7453><s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> and he that <S%H6315>speaketh<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4422>escape.<s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> will <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince:<s%> and every <S%H3605>man<s%> is a <S%H7453>friend<s%> to him that giveth <S%H376>gifts.<s%> <S%H4976><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor<s%> do <S%H8130>hate<s%> him: how much <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588><s%> do his <S%H4828>friends<s%> go <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him? he <S%H7291>pursueth<s%> them with <S%H561>words,<s%> yet <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H3808>wanting<s%> to him.
He that <S%H7069>getteth<s%> <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul:<s%> he that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5352>unpunished,<s%> and he that <S%H6315>speaketh<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

Delight <S%H8588><s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5000>seemly<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool;<s%> much <S%H637>less<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> to have <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
The <S%H7922>discretion<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H748>deferreth<s%> his <S%H639>anger;<s%> and it is his <S%H8597>glory<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H6588>transgression.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2197>wrath<s%> is as the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion;<s%> but his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is as <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6212>grass.<s%>

A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H1942>calamity<s%> of his <S%H1>father:<s%> and the <S%H4079>contentions<s%> of a <S%H802>wife<s%> are a <S%H2956>continual<s%> <S%H1812>dropping.<s%>
House <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H1952>riches<s%> are the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H1>fathers:<s%> and a <S%H7919>prudent<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> is from the <S%H4480>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>
Slothfulness <S%H6103><s%> <S%H5307>casteth<s%> into a deep <S%H8639>sleep;<s%> and an <S%H7423>idle<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall suffer <S%H7456>hunger.<s%>
He that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul;<s%> but he that <S%H959>despiseth<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
He that hath <S%H2603>pity<s%> upon the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H3867>lendeth<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and that which he hath <S%H1576>given<s%> will he pay him <S%H7999>again.<s%>

Chasten <S%H3256><s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and let <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5375>spare<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> his <S%H4191>crying.<s%>

A man of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall <S%H5375>suffer<s%> <S%H6066>punishment:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him, <S%H5750>yet<s%> thou must do it <S%H3254>again.<s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest be <S%H2449>wise<s%> in thy <S%H319>latter<s%> end.
There are <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> in a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> nevertheless the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> is his <S%H2617>kindness:<s%> and a <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H3577>liar.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> tendeth to <S%H2416>life:<s%> and he that hath it shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> <S%H7649>satisfied;<s%> he shall <S%H1077>not<s%> be <S%H6485>visited<s%> with <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

A <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man <S%H2934>hideth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H6747>bosom,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> so <S%H1571>much<s%> as bring it to his mouth <S%H413>again.<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H7725><s%>

Smite <S%H5221><s%> a <S%H3887>scorner,<s%> and the <S%H6612>simple<s%> will <S%H6191>beware:<s%> and <S%H3198>reprove<s%> one that hath <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and he will <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
He that <S%H7703>wasteth<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and chaseth <S%H1272>away<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> that causeth <S%H954>shame,<s%> and bringeth <S%H2659>reproach.<s%>
Cease, <S%H2308><s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> that causeth to <S%H7686>err<s%> from the <S%H4480>words<s%> <S%H561><s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
An <S%H1100>ungodly<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H3887>scorneth<s%> <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> and the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>devoureth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
Judgments <S%H8201><s%> are <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H3887>scorners,<s%> and <S%H4112>stripes<s%> for the <S%H1460>back<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
